snippet.title: PC Engine Longplay [248] Travel Epule
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

Epule (Epuru) is a girl dressed in a penguin suit that travels around with her little blue penguin and is trying to get back home. There is this adventure mode and a VS. mode, in which you can play against Pal, the boy in the blue penguin suit, however you can't play the adventure mode with him so he is kind of useless (for someone that is showed as a protagonist in this game)...

00:53:51 VS. mode

spolier:

This game has also a downer conclusion, but whatever you do you can't save the little blue penguin! He is possesed, so if he wins against you it's game over and there is no healing spell for him or anything similar... Why all that depression? Is there any way to save him? -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
